about_the_game:
Welcome to Glitch, the next frontier in Virtual Reality gaming! Prepare to immerse yourself in a pulsating sci-fi universe, where the line between reality and the digital realm blurs. Designed as a MOBA game, Glitch offers you adrenaline-charged 5v5 battles that test your strategy, teamwork, and skill.

In the world of Glitch, you're not just a player, but a virtual hacker. You have the freedom to select from a pool of abilities, enabling you to customize your avatar to match your gaming style. Each match is a sprint, lasting no more than 15 minutes of heart-racing, strategic combat. Outmaneuver opponents, bring down their defensive firewalls, and ultimately seize control of their database to claim victory.

But Glitch is more than just a game; it's a community. Level up, participate in tournaments, and grow alongside a vibrant, engaged player base. Plus, with the promise of account progression and a robust meta-game, every match brings you closer to becoming a legend in the Glitch universe.

So, if you're up for the challenge and ready to make your mark on a game that's redefining the VR landscape, Glitch awaits. Strap on your headset, step into the arena, and get ready to experience gaming like never before. Welcome to Glitch, champion!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100 / AMD Ryzen 3 1200, FX4350 or greater
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR or Oculus PC
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Welcome to Glitch! Suit up for explosive 5v5 MOBA battles in a vibrant sci-fi universe, customize your avatar with unique abilities, and dive into fast-paced, strategic skirmishes. Your mission, is to outwit opponents, demolish enemy firewalls, and capture their database. Gear up, it's game time!
